content: मर्मन् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [मृ-मनिन्] {@--1@} ({%a%}) A vital part of the body, the vitals, weak or tender point (of the body); तथवै तीव्रो हृदि शोकशंकुर्मर्माणि कृंतन्नपि किं न सोढः <ls>U. 3. 35</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 153</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">16</ls>; स्वहृदयमर्मणि वर्म करोति <ls>Gīt. 4.</ls> ({%b%}) Any vital member or organ. {@--2@} Any weak or vulnerable point, a defect, failing. {@--3@} The core, quick. {@--4@} Any joint (of a limb). {@--5@} The secret or hidden meaning, the pith or essence (of anything); काव्यमर्भप्रकाशिका टीका; नत्वा गंगाधरं मर्मप्रकाशं तनुते गुरुं --तागेशभट्ट. {@--6@} A secret, a mystery. {@--7@} Truth.
